Léonce Ngabo (amụrụ n'afọ 1951) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Burundi
Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1992 Gito l'ingrat bụ ihe nkiri mbụ nke Burundi.
Ngabo gụrụ kemịkalụ, mana ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmasị n'egwú ma dee ihe nkiri maka mmepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na akụkọ ifo
Site na nkwado nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Switzerland, ọ nwetara ọganihu maka ihe nkiri zuru oke
Ihe nkiri ahụ, Gito l'ingrat, nwetara nlebara anya mba ụwa.

Ngabo bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke International Festival of Cinema and Broadcasting in Burundi (FESTICAB). O nyekwara aka guzobe East African Film Network (EAFN) na 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka onyeisi oche EAFN.
